ridgecrest_2019.notes: Eastern California Shear Zone M7.1 - preceded by M6.4 foreshock on July 4

tohoku_2011.notes: Japan Trench M9.0 - largest recorded Japan earthquake

turkey_2023.notes: East Anatolian Fault M7.8 - deadliest 2023 earthquake

chile_2010.notes: Maule M8.8 - sixth largest recorded earthquake

morocco_2023.notes: High Atlas M6.8 - largest Morocco earthquake since 1960

kaikoura_2016.notes: South Island M7.8 - Complex multi-fault rupture

anchorage_2018.notes: Cook Inlet M7.1 - Deep intraslab event (47km depth)

kumamoto_2016.notes: Kyushu M7.0 - Preceded by M6.5 foreshock on Apr 14

hualien_2024.notes: East coast Taiwan M7.4 - Strongest Taiwan quake since 1999
